title: Account Name Change (pls help)
body:
Hey guys, 

really need advice. 

My second account is called -snip-and I want to change my main account name to this name. When I change my name on my smurf, is the name -snip- back available, so I can use this name on my main then? Don't want to waste money if thats not possible. 

If this is not possible, can I do something like that via the Riot support?

Thanks in advance!

Best, 

Max {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: I snipped out your names for privacy.  A username is a private piece of account information and not something that's changed.  If you are meaning your summoner name, then we may be able to assist with you.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and request a summoner name swap.  As long as you have the required currency for a name change and can verify both accounts are yours, then we should be able to provide this.  We'll reply to your ticket asap!
